docs.snippet: The Oceania Football Confederation will wait until after world governing body FIFA has completed its investigation into how Qatar won the 2022 World Cup rights before it makes any comment on whether their organisation has been caught up in the sca...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Oceania Football Confederation will wait until after world governing body FIFA has completed its investigation into how Qatar won the 2022 World Cup rights before it makes any comment on whether their organisation has been caught up in the scandal.

headline.main: Oceania Remain Tightlipped Over Qatar 2022 Investigation
headline.print_headline: Oceania Remain Tightlipped Over Qatar 2022 Investigation

docs.snippet: President Barack Obama said on Thursday he would make "no apologies" for agreeing to a deal that released Taliban detainee Sergeant Bowe Bergdahl, despite controversy in Washington that Congress was not notified ahead of time....
docs.lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama said on Thursday he would make "no apologies" for agreeing to a deal that released Taliban detainee Sergeant Bowe Bergdahl, despite controversy in Washington that Congress was not notified ahead of time.

headline.main: Obama: 'No Apologies' on Deal to Free Bergdahl From Taliban
headline.print_headline: Obama: 'No Apologies' on Deal to Free Bergdahl From Taliban

docs.snippet: President Barack Obama said Thursday he "absolutely makes no apologies" for seeking the release of Sgt. Bowe Bergdahl in a prisoner swap with the Taliban, vigorously defending an exchange that has caused a furor in the United States and has dogged...
docs.lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama said Thursday he "absolutely makes no apologies" for seeking the release of Sgt. Bowe Bergdahl in a prisoner swap with the Taliban, vigorously defending an exchange that has caused a furor in the United States and has dogged the president on his European trip this week.

headline.main: Obama: No Apology for Bergdahl Prisoner Exchange
headline.print_headline: Obama: No Apology for Bergdahl Prisoner Exchange
